product.name: Wild Fable Women's High-Rise Tapered Joggers -
product.description: Solid-color joggers from Wild Fable. Made of midweight, stretchy cotton-blend fabric for cozy comfort. Tailored in a relaxed fit with a taper-leg cut and elastic-cinched ankle cuffs. Sport a high-waisted silhouette with an elastic waistband and a front drawstring for a secure fit. Side pockets complete the look with functional flair.
product.bullet_points:
• Midweight, stretchy cotton blend
• Elasticized waistband with drawstring
• Tapered leg with a relaxed fit
• Elastic-cinched ankles
• Side pockets
features: Tapered leg with a relaxed fit
